SupavisioJ.ConvertListFiles.ADC

Class ADC

  • java.lang.Object
    • SupavisioJ.ConvertListFiles.ADC.ADC

  • public class ADC
extends Object
    This class is used to describe ADC and associated methods ADC basically contains a list of events (an event : x,y,E)

      Saves the ADC in a binary format (short)X,(short)Y,(Integer)E The file can be open with SupavisioJ (but not with the old Supavisio)
      void saveXYEListFile(String path, Short type)
      Saves the ADC in a file in the supavisio format (see below) The file can be open with the old Supavisio, not by SupavisioJ

        y - y-coordinate for pixel

        Saves median map as a 2D text file using given path
        Parameters:
        path - filename for 2D text file

      • saveXYEListFile

        public void saveXYEListFile(DataOutputStream ops)
        Saves the ADC in a binary format (short)X,(short)Y,(Integer)E The file can be open with SupavisioJ (but not with the old Supavisio)
        Parameters:
        ops - stream where data will be saved. At the end of process ops will be closed.

      • saveXYEListFile

        public void saveXYEListFile(String path)
        Saves the ADC in a binary format (short)X,(short)Y,(Integer)E The file can be open with SupavisioJ (but not with the old Supavisio)
        Parameters:
        path - filename for the datafile to be saved

      • saveXYEListFile

        public void saveXYEListFile(String path,
                   Short type)
        Saves the ADC in a file in the supavisio format (see below) The file can be open with the old Supavisio, not by SupavisioJ
        Parameters:
        path - filename for the datafile to be saved
        type - type of data to be saved (see below) supavisio is little endian type (short)0:pixe;1(rbs);2:Stim;5:erda (short)X size of map (short)Y size of map events: (short)X,(short)Y, (short)E
